abstract: The search for the next chief executive to take the reins at Bank of America is proving tricky, The Wall Street Journal reported.
snippet: The search for the next chief executive to take the reins at Bank of America is proving tricky, The Wall Street Journal reported.
lead_paragraph: Finding the right person to take the reins at Bank of America is apparently proving a tough ticket to fill.

headline.main: Snags in Search for New BofA Chief?
